case.title: Vivacious French-African lady looking for... - 39 (North London)
case.text: I'm a vivacious, pretty, fun and bright lady from France. I have been living in London long enough to call it home. I like movies, music and dancing (salsa is a big favorite.) I enjoy life in general, have a curious nature and I travel extensively in and around London or other more exotic places. I'm looking for a gentleman with a kind soul and good sense of humor. Someone who could sweep me of my feet and take me on the adventure off a lifetime! If you recognize yourself in this send me an email with a picture and we will take it from there...
